Description: Postcard; printed paper; black and white real photograph showing the road to the pyramids at Giza.
Producer name: Published by: The Cairo Postcard Trust
Curator's comments: Real photo card; postally used. Message continues on a second card but this reads: "YMCA, St David's, Cairo. My dear Florrie, I am sending one or two pcs [postcards] for a change as I am in a hurry to get this off. I expect you have had some like these before - never mind I can't get any others, dearest. I had a letter last night from mother but none from you. Have a luck [?]. Still I hope to get some written within these days. We had our..." Although this message is not signed it is cealy from the sender called Jack (see for example EPH-ME 2973).
Associated names: Named in inscription: Miss Florence Bradbury
Associated events: Named in Inscription: First World War
